text:
hi <@U02JP7GQ0KW>, i'd say the right candidate has a background in seo and content — enough so she or he (or vice versa) can pinpoint keywords to target and nurture additional growth of evergreen content.

i'd also say the candidate should have some experience with project management and building up a content organization up (bringing onboard freelancers, hiring in-house writers and editors).

just my two cents. not an expert by any means. happy to chat more if you want. feel free to dm.
